text: wbsbb qawlihim -ela sabil althkm walasthza'-: hdha aldhy yadaei linafsih hdha almansib (qtlnah), wama qutiluu eisaa wama slbwh, bal slbu rajulaan shbyhana bih znnana minhum 'anah eysa. wamin addaea qatlah min alyhwd, wamin aslmh 'iilayhim min alnsara, klhm waqewn fi shakin whayrat, la eilm ladayhim 'iilaa atibae alzn, wama qataluh mutayaqinin bal shakyn mtwhmyn
